content: Our goals for 2023 include achieving at least $1.14 share in FFO, successfully addressing the $300 million mortgage maturing at Bergen Towne Center, commencing $15 million of annualized gross rent included in our $29 million executed lease pipeline, activating another $50 million to $75 million in new redevelopment projects at a 10% or greater incremental return on cost, obtaining entitlements for approximately 450 residential units at Bergen Towne Center, and advancing our redevelopment plans at Sunrise Mall.
